data.name: Zoological Era II
data.detailed_description:
Creature-battling real-time action-RPG. Battle 2D characters in 3D space. Animal types have even more depth, while retaining the traits that made each type so distinguishable. Experience the challenges of each one, with new battle dynamics to add to the gameplay. (Note: Characters stay facing in the same direction, but can move all around​.)

• Real-time gameplay
• Quick Battle mode for selecting characters to join you and to fight against in a single match.
• Animal types to choose from, each with their own dynamics, weaknesses, and resistances.
• Environmental temperature, which affects cold-blooded and warm-blooded animals in different ways.
• Arcade mode for increasingly difficult enemies.
• Hand-drawn character animation
• 1-4 players offline, using the same screen.
• Controller support
• Lore and culture of a fantasy world

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 8.1
  • Processor: Intel Celeron CPU 1007U @ 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
